name: The Verge  - V O I D
description: A true black theme for theverge.com. Take a look @ GitHub Gist The Verge Forum style coming soon.
css: @-moz-document domain("theverge.com"){.c-masthead__main{background-image:none!important}.c-compact-river__entry,.c-entry-group-labels__item::before,.c-entry-group-labels__item:first-child::before,.c-entry-group-labels__item:nth-child(2)::before,.c-newsletter_signup_box__icon,.c-newsletter_signup_box__main,.c-rock-list,.c-seven-up .c-entry-box--compact:last-child,.l-hub-wrapper,.l-main-content,.l-reskin,body{background-color:#000}.c-pagination{background-color:#111}.c-compact-river__entry{border-top:1px solid #333}.c-group-header{border-bottom:none}.c-entry-hero--feature .c-page-title,.c-global-header,.c-newsletter_signup_box__main,.c-page-title,.c-pagination__text,.c-rock-list li a,.c-seven-up .c-entry-box--compact:last-child,.c-seven-up .c-entry-box--compact:last-child .c-byline,.l-main-content__above-subnav,body,h1 a,h2 a,h3 a,h4 a,h5 a,h6 a{color:#ddd}.c-comments__message,.c-group-subnav__item a,.c-seven-up .c-entry-box--compact:last-child .c-byline,.p-dek,.p-entry-header__labels a{color:#ccc}.c-simple-link-list-stream .p-counter-link__count{color:#000}.c-comments__list{border:1px solid #555}.c-comments__comment,.c-comments__message,.c-comments__recommended{border-bottom:1px solid #555;border-left:3px solid #555}.c-tab-bar.tab-bar-fixed{display:none}.c-comments__count span,.c-entry-group-labels__item:nth-child(2){color:#8478e3}.p-page-title{border-bottom:4px solid #bbb}}
